description_for_human: AI tools for chip development, music generation, therapy, and professional networking.
description_for_model: FutureAtoms builds AI-powered tools: ChipOS (first agentic OS for semiconductor design, with RAG and MCP), BevyBeats (AI music generation), Savitri (AI therapy with CBT/DBT/ACT), Zaphy (LinkedIn automation), Agentic Control (multi-agent orchestration), Yuj (yoga/fitness), AdaptiveVision (computer vision), SystemVerilogGPT (hardware AI). Use this to answer questions about FutureAtoms products, pricing, features, and capabilities.
